item.title: Marketing Questions in Product Case
item.description: Marketing questions are about product positioning, customers, and handling competition. Approach: Understand the Company: What are the company’s goals? What is its mission? What are its strengths and weaknesses? What threatens it? Understand the Competition: Break down the competition into segments. Who competes and in what market?(竞争对手是谁) How do they position themselves? How entrenched are they?(怎么巩固自己的位置) What are their strengths and weaknesses? Understand the Customers: Who are your customers? What desire or need is this product fulfilling?

item.description: Boston Street | Shot on iPhone X Type of Metrics (Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Referral, and Revenue) User acquisition (用户注册率） How many users do you have ?
